title: What kids are eligible for the COVID-19 vaccine? Here's what parents should know.
author: Parris Kane
description: With Gov. Asa Hutchinson's announcement that Arkansans age 16 and older are now eligible to receive COVID-19 vaccinations came other hopeful news from Pfizer. The company reportedWednesday that its COVID-19 vaccine is safe and strongly protective in kids as young as 12, a step toward possibly beginning shots in that age group before kids head back to school in the fall. Parents may be wondering if they should vaccinate their teenagers and what kind of risk is involved. Dr.
